Usman Ahmad

Principal DevOps Engineer

Usman Ahmad is a seasoned Principal DevOps Engineer with 7+ years of hands-on experience in designing and deploying scalable cloud-native solutions on AWS, GCP, and Kubernetes. He has trained over 500+ professionals in Cloud, DevOps, and CI/CD automation, and specializes in Docker, EKS/GKE, GitHub Actions, Helm, and infrastructure as code (IaC). With a strong background in building resilient systems and a passion for mentorship, Usman combines deep technical expertise with a practical, impact-driven approach to modern DevOps.s

Asad Bashir

DevSecOps Expert

A security-focused DevSecOps Engineer with a strong foundation in agile methodologies, network security, and penetration testing. Backed by certifications including Certified Associate in Skillfront Scrum Fundamentals (CASF), ISO/IEC 27001 Information Security Associate, CNSS Certified Network Security Specialist, and Certified Penetration Testing Professional, they bring a well-rounded approach to integrating security across the software development lifecycle. Also certified as Fortinet NSE 1 & NSE 2 Network Security Associate, they excel at implementing secure CI/CD pipelines, ensuring compliance, and proactively identifying vulnerabilities in cloud-native environments.
